status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h4. Problem Description
Titanium.Locale.currentLocale return undefined.  It’s a bug.   

h4. Steps to reproduce
1. Create new mobile project (classic titanium)
2. Paste this code into app.js: 
{code}
Ti.API.info('Titanium.Locale.currentLocale'+ Titanium.Locale.currentLocale); 
{code}
3. Run this in the simulator. 
4. Check Ti Studio Console

h4. Actual Results 
Its should return simulator locale name but its return undefined
